skins.selfIntroduction: My history as a ship...? I escorted Hood and Warspite, and also participated in anti-submarine missions... Basically, I've been here and there and done this and that. I guess you could say I have quite a bit of experience? That being the case, feel free to call upon me, whether in battle or otherwise!
skins.acquisition: Well met, Commander. I am Icarus, I-class destroyer from the Royal Navy. I specialize in escort and anti-submarine operations. I look forward to working with you.
skins.login: Commander, did you just arrive? Hehe. There are documents on your desk. I'll have your tea ready in just a moment, so please get started on your work.
skins.details: A change of clothes for the commander, the menus for tomorrow's meals... Oh, Commander. When did you get here? ...Don't mind me, I'm just doing some daily preparations~?
skins.secretaryIdle1: Commander, please let me know when you head out! Whether it's an umbrella or a coat, I'll be sure to have it ready for you.
skins.secretaryIdle2: Eskimo looks like she wants some attention... Commander, I'll do something about her, so please focus on your work. ...That's right, I can call Abercrombie over!
skins.secretaryIdle3: I guess destroyers really have their limits... If only I had bigger guns or torpedoes... Oh, I was just talking to myself. Please don't mind me!
skins.secretaryTouch: Was there something you wanted me to do?
skins.secretarySpecialTouch: I-I'm not sure if we should be doing this...
skins.secretaryHeadpat: Hehehe. You know, this feels kind of nice.

skins.shipDescription: This is a special exercise for our on-site medical facilities! Well, that's what they said anyway, but isn't this kind of weird...? I feel like I'd rather be taking care of others, not the other way around...
skins.acquisition: This is a special exercise for our on-site medical facilities! Well, that's what they said anyway, but isn't this kind of weird...? I feel like I'd rather be taking care of others, not the other way around...
skins.login: Commander, did you come by to check up on me? Though I might look like a patient, I'm actually perfectly fine~
skins.details: I've already prepared your changes of clothing and daily necessities in advance. Make sure you don't neglect your health while I'm away participating in this exercise, alright?
skins.secretaryIdle1: Looking out the window of this hospital room at the scenery is making me oddly emotional...
skins.secretaryIdle2: These bandages and this IV are just here for practice. They're not the real deal, you know?
skins.secretaryIdle3: It's hard to move around properly in this... I'm sure there will be an impact on my firepower, too...
skins.secretaryTouch: Even in this situation, I'm sure there is something that I can do for you, Commander.
skins.secretarySpecialTouch: C-Commander? We're in the medical facility, you know...

skins.shipDescription: "Let's go explore the ocean together! What special things will we be able to find today~?" Hehe, how's that, Commander?
skins.acquisition: "Let's go explore the ocean together! What special things will we be able to find today~?" Hehe, how's that, Commander?
skins.login: The manjuus and I are all ready to go! You can start taking pictures whenever you're ready.
skins.details: No matter how many times I see it, it never gets old... It's simply amazing that we're able to create amazing sets like this at the Port.
skins.secretaryIdle1: So this is what the submarine girls see while they battle... Hehe, the scenery down here is amazing.
skins.secretaryIdle2: This swimsuit fits me nice and tight. It's so easy to move around in it!
skins.secretaryIdle3: Oh, I caught you spacing out, Commander. I had the manjuus take a picture as proof, too. Why don't you take a look? Heehee~
skins.secretarySpecialTouch: W-We're still in the middle of the shoot, Commander!
